Detailed Description

This file contains implementation of tcp/ip plugin for MIN.

Version:
0.1

void pl_open_plugin ( void *  opts  ) 

Plugin open function.

Parameters:
opts contains options struct for TCP/IP plugin
Read & write EAPI Protocol messages and act accordingly, until explicitly closed with MIN_CLOSE_REQ or the connection breaks.
